text:
<!channel> - We've received word that we are able to _begin_ to talk about the Adidas All Day app, albeit within some specific guidelines. 

<@U1HKQRLMR> has put together some initial guidelines here: 
<https://docs.google.com/a/uncorkedstudios.com/document/d/1zBuJQ8uteZdkXX5mcwH-wCbehHLgywWqX-UQU96WuRY/edit?usp=sharing>

The list of guidelines could grow, and we will do our best to keep everyone in the loop. 

*Please, before you post anything anywhere, review these guidelines. If you have any questions, concerns, or want a gut check on whatever you're hoping to post, please bring it up*

Exciting that this is starting to get out into the wild!
And if you're linking to anything, please send folks here: <http://www.adidas.com/us/allday>

attachments.title: All Day Fitness App | adidas US
attachments.text: Create all round well being with the All Day free fitness app from adidas. Discover workout tips, nutrition goals and challenges for mind, body and soul.
attachments.fallback: adidas United States: All Day Fitness App | adidas US

text: we're working on getting our case study together, which will be more in depth and specific to our work.
<!channel> - heads up - Adidas site link is dead. Please do NOT use that link. More as we know it
